q: Richard Prather , a retired auto worker from Anderson, said after the Pendleton town hall that he believed Mike Pence 's reputation as a federal spending hawk would serve him well running for the governor's office. I think he would have been a good candidate for president, but I'm glad he didn't, Richard Prather said.`` In the next race, he can run for president.''

They want to become younger and more aggressive, he said.`` But the teams at Google are globally organized, so whatever changes are made probably won't be reflected in regional offices like the one in Cambridge.'' The California state treasurer, Bill Lockyer , on Monday held a conference call in which he took issue with the critics of the current pension system. They've confused the near-term budget shortfalls with the long-term funding obligations, and grossly inflated the size of the long-term liabilities, he said. Asked about the high valuations being put on companies such as social network company Facebook and game developer Zynga, Eric Schmidt said in an interview with Bilanz: There are clear signs of a bubble... But valuations are what they are. Arthur Levitt , who headed the SEC from 1993 to 2001, said the severity of Steve Jobs ' cancer is well established.( Bloomberg) We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come. Google CEO Eric Schmidt , announcing that he will step down from the top spot, making room for the ascension of co-founder Larry Page to take over April 4.
